list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
a conventional or stylized representation of a star, typically one having five or more points.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the walls were painted with silver moons and stars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bức tường được vẽ bằng mặt trăng bạc và các ngôi sao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a famous or exceptionally talented performer in the world of entertainment or sports.
a planet, constellation, or configuration regarded as influencing someone's fortunes or personality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his golf destiny was written in the stars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Định mệnh golf của anh ta được viết trong những vì sao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a movie, play, or other show) have (someone) as a principal performer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một bộ phim tham gia Liza Minnelli

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decorate or cover with star-shaped marks or objects.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cỏ dày đóng vai chính với hoa
